Name: The Blueness of a Wound
About the game: ENTER A DARK MODERN FAIRY TALE... Haunted by a tragic event that led to the loss of her sister, Lana is a young woman who returns to the place of her childhood to seek answers. That place is Australia's Blue Mountains, which according to the stories of the Dreamtime is where the omnipotent Rainbow Serpent lives. To get the answers she seeks Lana will have to venture deep into the primordial valleys of the mountains where the forces from the beginning of time still hold dominion. * A perfect cross between a graphic novel and adventure game * Use Tarot cards, Magic and your intuition to progress * A surreal story based on folklore * A highly unique art style featuring watercolor illustrations * Features music by legendary Japanese composer Hiroki Kikuta (Secret of Mana, Koudelka) *Alphabet Planet/7th Heaven used with permission. Creative Commons By Hiroki Kikuta. Arranged by Roko Zaper
